TopicTitle: Putting Ablators on wings and spaceplane parts.

Articles.Content: Ever since I played with 1.0's stock aero, It makes flying easier. I find it much more forgiving than FAR in regards to aicraft stability. However, when I make spaceplanes and get them to reenter (even from a 75km suborbital trajectory that goes 180 degrees around kerbin) They almost always partly burn up, especially the wings and control surfaces. Is there a way to put ablators on them? Maybe an MM config?
I'm sure I could do it. I'll see what I can do.
